english.segment1: Do you remember. That day of your life. It seemed like yesterday. That joy it filled my heart
english.segment2: It doesn't feel the same. And I'm feeling dry. Amidst my pain
english.segment3: Now something's different. The times oh they have changed. The love's the same. Yet emotion's running dry
english.segment4: The feeling's gone. But I know you're still there. I guess it's just part of life. That I must bare
english.segment5: It doesn't feel the same. And I'm feeling down. Amidst my pain
english.segment6: I see all my shame. And I'm feeling dry. But who am I to complain. Who am I to complain
english.segment7: I'm still free. You've set me free
english.segment8: It doesn't feel the same. And I'm feeling down. Amidst my pain
english.segment9: I see all my shame. And I'm feeling dry. But who am I to complain
english.segment10: It doesn't feel the same. And I'm feeling down. Amidst my pain
english.segment11: I see all my shame. And I'm feeling dry. But who am I to complain
